Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Analyte(s): Total antibodies (IgG and IgM) to hepatitis A virus (anti-HAV)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MONOLISA™ Anti-HAV EIA used with EVOLIS™ Automated Microplate System for qualitative detection of total antibodies to hepatitis A virus.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of total antibodies (IgG and IgM) to hepatitis A virus in adult and pediatric human serum or plasma (EDTA, Heparin, Citrate, ACD); aids in diagnosis of acute or past HAV infection and identification of HAV-susceptible individuals for vaccination; not intended for blood or tissue donor screening.
